values.value: Site Critical Element* - Employees engaged in activities on a low-slope roof (<4"/12") are considered protected from fall hazards as long as they are completely encircled by a solid wall at least 39in. above the highest walking/working surface. When any portion of the parapet wall system is less than 39in. tall, other fall protection measures are required. CFR 1910.29
If the roof's parapet wall is less than 39 in. high are proper fall protection measures being utilized?
